name: tabscript
description: Modern TypeScript without the {(noise;)} but with reactivity.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist dist-min ; tsc --target es2023 --declaration --sourceMap --outDir dist src/*.ts && mkdir -p dist-min && for f in dist/*.js; do terser --module --mangle module --keep-fnames --source-map -o dist-min/$(basename $f) -- $f; done && cp dist/*.d.ts dist-min
scripts.test: ./bin/cli.js tests/test.ts --output /dev/stdout | diff -u tests/test.js - && ./bin/cli.js tests/error.ts --recover --output /dev/stdout 2> /dev/null | diff -u tests/error.js - && echo OK
scripts.prepack: npm run build && npm run test

author: Frank van Viegen
